name: TRIUMPH GROUP INTERNATIONAL
goal:
Triumph Group international is an independent and privately held company, established in 1997 with headquarter in Rome, Italy, and branch offices in London, Brussels, Doha, Shanghai and Washington.
Our group specialises in the organisation of international events and large scale conferences as well as in marketing and communication activities and association management. Triumph Group International (TGI) also owns its own travel agency named Triumph Travel and Incentive.
With a turnover of 31,5 million in 2014, we organise an average of 550 events per year worldwide. We are ISO certified and we are member of the following international organizations: ICCA (International Conference and Congress Association); MPI (Meeting Planner International); EFAPCO (European Federation of the Association of Professional Congress Organizer).
Our clients range from national and international associations to governmental organisations, corporate and private companies. TGI staff members originate from all over the world and are fluent in many languages; they have a wide and in-depth knowledge of event management in their respective countries.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Audiovisual and Media, Budget, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Customs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Humanitarian Aid, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Sport, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives: Research; fisheries; travel; agriculture; communication; external relations; digitalization of public administration
